content:
ECKeyXmlFormat Enum

Definition

Defines XML serialization formats for elliptic curve keys.

In this Article

public enum ECKeyXmlFormat
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ECKeyXmlFormat

Remarks

This enumeration contains only one member, Rfc4050. This format describes how Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) keys are serialized to XML.

Fields

Rfc4050

An XML serialization format described in RFC 4050, "Using the Elliptic Curve Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) for XML Digital Signatures."
